headline: M&T Bank Corporation Announces Increased Common Stock Dividend
summary: M&T Bank Corporation ("M&T") (NYSE:MTB) announced that it has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.50 per share on its common stock. This represents an increase of $.15 per share, or 11 percent, from the previous $1.35 per share dividend paid in the second quarter of 2025. The dividend will be payable September 30, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on September 2, 2025.

headline: Hartford MidCap Value Fund Q2 2025 Commentary
